particle.title: Particle
particle.description: A persistent particle packet which will follow the collectible entity.

pickupParticle.title: Pickup Particle
pickupParticle.description: A one-time particle packet which will be launched when the collectible is catched.

spawnSound.title: Spawn Sound
spawnSound.description: A sound event which will play when the collectible is spawned.

pickupSound.title: Pickup Sound
pickupSound.description: A sound event which will play when the collectible is collected.

pickupName.title: Pickup Name
pickupName.description: A label which will appear above the shooter when the powerup is collected.

pickupFont.title: Pickup Font
pickupFont.description: A font which will be used for the label.

effects.title: Effects
effects.description: A list of effects to be applied when the powerup is collected.

dropEffects.title: Drop Effects
dropEffects.description: A list of effects to be applied when the powerup is not collected and falls out of the screen.
